119.heading: Barkley, Biff.

119.author: art: Joe Doolin
119.appears_in: 12 p. in Rangers of Freedom Comics, no. 1 (Oct. 1941).
notes: Introduction and origin of The Rangers of Freedom (Biff Barkley, Tex Russell, Percy Cabot; not the Marine heroes featured in #5-7); villains are The Super-Brain (introduced), and Nazis; appearances of Franklin D. Roosevelt, Gloria Travers (Miss America of 1941; name revealed next issue).

Data from Lou Mougin via The Grand Comics Database Project.
